column4: how do i work around all this UUID stuff when i want to clone a box?
i believe the UUIDs are just symlinks to various devices, they're in the /dev/disks/by-UUID/ directory
to this day, nothing practical really -- except that say your disk crashes, you can replace the physical disk and maintain the same UUID
yes and no -- yes because you can keep the same UUID, no because if the device number changes the UUID symlink points nowhere and linux fails to boot :-s
